DataElement.preferredName: Observation Plan Study Activity Status Code ActivityStatus
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._A condition or state at a particular time.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data._The code that describes the value representing the current state of the activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.
To devise, contrive, or form in design.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The code that describes the value representing the current state of the activity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Exerting influence or producing an effect.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates an absence of a measurable amount of a specific function or role performed by a biological entity in a Biophysical Process, Biochemical Reaction, or Biochemical Process.

Concepts.definition: Indicates an absence of a measurable amount of a specific function or role performed by a biological entity in a biophysical process, biochemical reaction, or biochemical process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
